Header: European Parliamentarians hold talks with Finance Minister
Content: Two members of the European Parliament have called on Minister of Finance and Mass Media Mangala Samaraweera. They are Sir William Dartmouth and Geoffrey Van Orden. Several matters significant for bilateral relations were discussed at this meeting between the two European Parliament members and the Minister of Finance and Mas Media. Many subjects including the tourism industry and the GSP Plus concession were covered at the talks. Minister of Development Strategies and Internal Trade Malik Samarawickrema and Secretary to the Ministry of Finance and Mass Media joined in this discussion.
